items.sentence: Tom might be able to convince Mary to help us.
Tom might not be the one who broke the window.
Tom said he wanted to learn more about Boston.

Tom said he was hoping that you would do that.
Tom said he was hungry enough to eat anything.
Tom said he was too busy to help Mary do that.
Computer supplies are very expensive in Japan.
I gave Tom a couple of tickets for my concert.
I had one beer and pretended to be very drunk.
I want to become a TV announcer in the future.
Right now, there isn\'t much I can do to help.
I hear she is going to get married next month.
I hear that Tom really likes living in Boston.

Tom has learned a lot about Australia from me.
Tom has made some terrible decisions recently.
